comment: A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.

domainIncludes.comment: Any type of action, such as searching, reserving, or paying, necessary for an experience program, such as an adventure experience, a business experience, or a wellness experience.
A domestic or tamed animal that is kept for companionship or pleasure.
A collection of information specific to the involvement of a person or persons in a happening, such as a theme park, a guided tour being used or reported on for trade purposes.
Any service that provides an involvement, such as an adventure experience, wellness experience, social or business activity experience.
An involvement in an experience program in which some thing happens, such as a nature watching, woodware manufacturing, meditation, holiday trip, dinner, theme park visit, could be experienced.
A structure or place, such as a restaurant, hotel, theme park, hot spring bathing pool, parking lot, or meeting room, that provides a particular experience.
A guest condition of the abnormal reaction of the body to a previously encountered substance introduced by inhalation, ingestion, injection, or skin contact.
A tool or device carried by a guest for an activity.
A physical or mental condition that limits a guest's movements, senses, or activities.
A guest's decision which food to buy or eat.
A guest's physical or mental condition.
Specified privately owned articles for personal use by an individual.
An involvement in a happening, such as a theme park, a guided tour that is liked or wanted more than another item.
